nodes.text: Rhoa Kwi were a species of large, fearsome predators from Dathomir that often traveled in packs. They were bipedal reptiles with bulky square heads. Beady eyes were set in the sides of their head, and sharp biting teeth jutted from their lower jaw. They had greenish yellow hides. When provoked they would spit a poisonous substance. They were a Kwi variant.
